name: discordcrypt
description: End To End File & Message Encryption For The Discord Client

scripts.coverage: npm run build && node node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover tests/perform-tests.js coverage
scripts.test_hash: npm run build && node tests/perform-tests.js hash
scripts.test_scrypt: npm run build && node tests/perform-tests.js scrypt
scripts.test_ciphers: npm run build && node tests/perform-tests.js cipher
scripts.test_general: npm run build && node tests/perform-tests.js general
scripts.test_encoding: npm run build && node tests/perform-tests.js encoding
scripts.test_exchange: npm run build && node tests/perform-tests.js exchange

author: leogx9r
